webjump_braspag_pagador.label: Braspag
webjump_braspag_pagador.comment:
Pagador Braspag
Accept all the main payment method in an easy and safe manner.
Click here to configure

hint.hint:
Accept all the main payment method in an easy and safe manner.
Click here to know more.


Developed by Webjump. Oficial Magento Partner

status_update.label: Status Update
status_update.comment:
This feature automatically update order status when customer pay an Billet or a payment with authentication on issuer.
To use this feature, you must ask for Braspag setup the update status post to url: "{{secure_url}}/braspag_pagador/status/update".
If you don't know which are your store secure_url, access System->Configuration->Web->Secure.

allowed_ips.label: Allowed IPs from Braspag
allowed_ips.comment:
The order status update for security reasons must only accept requests from Braspag IPs. For more details, consult the integration manual.
Type one IP address per line.

payment_button_label.label: Label for print button at checkout

autoredirect.label: Automatically redirect to bank page
autoredirect.comment: Leave empty to not redirect automatically or type the delayed time in seconds

payment_instructions.label: Payment instructions for customer at checkout

payment_button_label.label: Label for print button at checkout

billet_expiration_date.label: Days for expiration
billet_expiration_date.comment: If empty, we will use the days configured by affiliation.

billet_instructions.label: Instructions to be printed on the Billet

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.comment: Contact Braspag to get your own Client ID.

client_secret.label: Client Secret
client_secret.comment: Contact Braspag to get your own Client ID.

mpi_is_active.label: Enabled
mpi_is_active.comment: Indicates whether Credit Card Transactions with Authentication 3DS 2.0 are Enabled.

mpi_mastercard_notify_only.label: Master Card - Notify Only
mpi_mastercard_notify_only.comment: Indicates whether the card transaction will be submitted in “notification only” mode. In this mode, the authentication process will not be triggered, however, the data will be sent to Brand.

mpi_authorize_on_error.label: Authorize On Error
mpi_authorize_on_error.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Error case the authorization will be transactionated.

mpi_authorize_on_failure.label: Authorize On Failure
mpi_authorize_on_failure.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Failure case the authorization will be transactionated.

mpi_authorize_on_unenrolled.label: Authorize On Unenrolled
mpi_authorize_on_unenrolled.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Unenrolled case the authorization will be transactioneted.

mpi_is_active.label: Enabled
mpi_is_active.comment: Indicates whether Debit Card Transactions with Authentication 3DS 2.0 are Enabled.

mpi_mastercard_notify_only.label: Master Card - Notify Only
mpi_mastercard_notify_only.comment: Indicates whether the card transaction will be submitted in “notification only” mode. In this mode, the authentication process will not be triggered, however, the data will be sent to Brand.

mpi_authorize_on_error.label: Authorize On Error
mpi_authorize_on_error.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Error case the authorization will be transactionated.

mpi_authorize_on_failure.label: Authorize On Failure
mpi_authorize_on_failure.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Failure case the authorization will be transactionated.

mpi_authorize_on_unenrolled.label: Authorize On Unenrolled
mpi_authorize_on_unenrolled.comment: Indicates whether on Authentication Unenrolled case the authorization will be transactioneted.

hint.hint:
The best fraud prevention solution for your store.
Click here to know more.

creditcard_transaction.label: Credit Card Transactions
creditcard_transaction.comment: Payment status to be applied after anti fraud analysis when payment type is Credit Card.

creditcard_justclick_transaction.label: Credit Card Just Click Transactions
creditcard_justclick_transaction.comment: Payment status to be applied after anti fraud analysis when payment type is Credit Card JustClick.

fingerprint.label: Finger Print
fingerprint.comment: Identifier used to cross informations obtained by the browser of the internet user, with the data sent for analysis.

sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.comment: Tipo de Fluxo para realização da análise de fraude.</br>Primeiro Analise (Analyse First) </br>Primeiro Autorização (Authorize First)

sequence_criteria.label: Sequence Criteria
sequence_criteria.comment: Critério do fluxo</br>On Success - Só realiza a analise se tiver sucesso na transação.</br>Always - Sempre realiza a analise

capture_on_low_risk.label: Capture On Low Risk
capture_on_low_risk.comment: Identifica se a autorização deve ser com captura automática quando o risco de fraude for considerado baixo (Accept). Em casos de Reject ou Review, o fluxo permanece o mesmo, ou seja, a captura acontecerá conforme o valor especificado no parâmetro "Capture". Para a utilização deste parâmetro, a sequência do fluxo de análise de risco deve ser obrigatoriamente "AuthorizeFirst". Por depender do resutlado de análise de risco, este parâmetro só terá efeito quando o serviço de Antifraude for contratado.

void_on_high_risk.label: Void On High Risk
void_on_high_risk.comment: Identifica se o estorno deve acontecer automaticamente quando o risco de fraude for considerado alto (Reject). Em casos de Accept ou Review, o fluxo permanece o mesmo, ou seja, o estorno deve ser feito manualmente. Para a utilização deste parâmetro, a sequência do fluxo de análise de risco deve ser obrigatoriamente "AuthorizeFirst". Por depender do resutlado de análise de risco, este parâmetro só terá efeito quando o serviço de Antifraude for contratado.

store_code_to_fetch_self.label: Store Code From Customer Fetch Self
